kits.title: Deer Stalker
tags: never loses sight of a prey
faster than anything in this forest
weaknesses: only at home in the woods
cannot ever let a prey escape
prefers to shoot in the back
kits.mission: Patience is a virtue.

kits.title: Alderperson
kits.mission: Oh, to watch our people thrive in peace…

kits.title: Landed Noble
tags: “There has always been a Stoneheart in this castle”
kits.mission: Would that my house glory be restored!

kits.title: Fugitive
kits.mission: One day, I won’t have to run any more.

kits.title: Outcast
kits.mission: Will I ever be welcome among them?

kits.title: Hardworking Drudge
kits.mission: Eventually, all this hard work will pay off.

kits.title: Tavern Brawler
kits.mission: I wish something would make me forget my pain – for good!

kits.title: Ailing Wise Elder
kits.mission: What little time is left, I ought to spend it with them.

kits.title: Heal the Sick
kits.mission: I will help ALL of them.

kits.title: Become a Knight
kits.mission: I shall be a knight of the realm, serving the greater good.

kits.title: Our Village
kits.mission: This warm and welcoming home is worth every sacrifice.

kits.title: Childhood Sweetheart
kits.mission: There is nothing I would not do for this love!

kits.title: Ritualistic Circle
kits.mission: The next ritual must be held according to our customs.

kits.title: Cursed
kits.mission: I must find a way to free myself of this curse.

kits.title: Last of My Kind
kits.mission: It falls to me alone to continue the legacy of my kind.

kits.title: Forged in War
kits.mission: Are we fated to forever slay one another on the battlefield?

kits.title: Mystic Pilgrimage
kits.mission: My journey into the sacred mysteries has only just begun.

kits.title: Highborn Education
kits.mission: Knowledge must be passed on, or become lost to time.

kits.title: Well-Traveled
weaknesses: always leaves when it gets hard
kits.mission: The time has come to set out on a new journey!

kits.title: Battlerider
kits.mission: Ride, raid, and roar for the glory of the plains!

kits.title: Highlander
kits.mission: The Highlands have always stood free, even if that means alone.

kits.title: Beaver Kin
kits.mission: We say, find a place to build a home – then flood it with love.

kits.title: Sylvan Elf
kits.mission: Tread softly, as we are but the caretakers of this world.

kits.title: Caravan Folk
kits.mission: The lifeblood of the realm, we carry all but none care for us.

kits.title: Witchblood
kits.mission: Remain in the shadows and await the Reckoning.

kits.title: Spirited Youth
tags: first to strike, last to give up
still sees the good in people
kits.mission: Never surrender to darkness or despair

kits.title: Curious
kits.mission: There’s so much more to see and learn!

kits.title: Jovial Disposition
kits.mission: Drink, dance, and dream, for today is all we have!

kits.title: Gruff
kits.mission: Don’t talk so much.

kits.title: Practiced Liar
weaknesses: lie when I don’t mean to
kits.mission: Let’s see what I can get away with this time…

kits.title: Heart of Gold
kits.mission: There’s hardship to go around – let’s carry it together.

kits.title: Rumormonger
kits.mission: Whispered words are mightier than loud proclamations.

kits.title: Skilled with a bow
kits.mission: To shoot the perfect shot.

kits.title: Artisan
kits.mission: I shall make the finest creations this village has ever seen.

kits.title: Homesteader
kits.mission: I’ll gladly work myself to the bone to keep this house standing.

kits.title: Blacksmith
kits.mission: The forge is demanding, but it pays for a decent living.

kits.title: Skirmisher
kits.mission: Always strive to surprise your foe.

kits.title: Hinterland Tracker
kits.mission: If you wish something found in the wild, I’m your best chance.

kits.title: Sleight of Hand
kits.mission: Everyone’s a mark, they just don’t know it.

kits.title: Strong as an Ox
kits.mission: Use my strength to help others.

kits.title: Acrobatic Agility
kits.mission: I can make that jump.

kits.title: Tenacious
kits.mission: I will never give up.

kits.title: Prophetic Visions
kits.mission: Where do these visions come from, and why do they come to me?

kits.title: Uncommon Beauty
kits.mission: Beauty is but a distracting glamor; it is not who I truly am.

kits.title: Underwater Deftness
kits.mission: Nowhere do I feel more at home than deep in the murky water.

kits.title: A Light Against the Dark
kits.mission: Hold high the sacred fire so that the darkness is repelled.

kits.title: Postal Courier
kits.mission: “Climb every mountain, cross every river, this urgent word I safely shall deliver.”

kits.title: Contract Work
kits.mission: Take the coin and do the work; never one without the other.

kits.title: Protect the Land
kits.mission: I am the Watcher of this land – revere it, or turn back.

kits.title: Oath of Allegiance
kits.mission: So it was decreed by our Magnificent Liege, and so it shall be!

kits.title: Yearns for Revenge
kits.mission: I can never rest, not until justice is met.

kits.title: Adored
tags: let them bask in my light
kits.mission: I need EVERYONE to love me.

kits.title: Folk Hero
kits.mission: These people look to me to give them hope, and so I shall.

kits.title: Conspirator
kits.mission: “A spider in the dark does bite, yet promptly perishes in the light.”

kits.title: Respected Leader
kits.mission: Our one and only goal is finally within reach. Let us conquer it!

kits.title: Dockmaster
kits.mission: Nothing comes in or out of this port without me knowing about it!

kits.title: [Deity]’s
kits.mission: One day, mistress, I wish to become your most faithful servant.

kits.title: Denizens of the Unseen
kits.mission: Find the right one to whom I shall pass this lore, lest it be lost or misused.

kits.title: Monster Lore
kits.mission: If you want to survive out here, you need to know your creatures.

kits.title: Expert Appraiser
kits.mission: I collect only the finest wares and so I must know fine from common.

kits.title: Stargazer
kits.mission: Ominous is the night’s sky of late. Yet to avoid doom, I must disentangle its secrets.

kits.title: Knows Every Province
kits.mission: I am working on an atlas of the world…

kits.title: Tales of the Ancients
kits.mission: If I could remember it all, maybe I’d remember my part in it…

kits.title: Enthralling Entertainer
kits.mission: To win the bardic recitation at the castle – that would be something!

kits.title: Gifted Physician
kits.mission: Every patient saved is a merit, and every patient lost is a disgrace.

kits.title: Excellent Cook
kits.mission: Every meal is an opportunity to delight.

kits.title: Professional Burglar
kits.mission: This one is going to be the last job, I guarantee it!

kits.title: Formidable Weaponmaster
kits.mission: Once drawn, a weapon may only be sheathed again after it tasted blood.

kits.title: Seasoned Trader
tags: sense why they want to sell
kits.mission: I shall soon be the kingdom’s richest merchant.

kits.title: Bag of Enchanted Dust
kits.mission: Sprinkle a handful of magic into every somber situation.

kits.title: Heirloom Longsword
kits.mission: With this One True Sword, I will destroy the Lords of Maleficence.

kits.title: Cauldron of Conjuration
kits.mission: The more life I feed my cauldron, the more life I can conjure!

kits.title: Magic Seeds
kits.mission: If we could get a whole bag of these seeds, we could grow back Foxhollow Forest!

kits.title: Giant’s Gauntlet
kits.mission: The glove guides me to the kingdom of giants, where I will live as one of them!

kits.title: Staff of Spellbinding
tags: better if I know the spell
kits.mission: Become a master over all magic.

kits.title: Disembodied Spirit
kits.mission: I must banish those who invade my dwelling place.

kits.title: One of the Fair Folk
kits.mission: Our realm needs a true hero, and I’ve been tasked to find them.

kits.title: Hellspawn
kits.mission: Find someone to take my place in hell.

kits.title: Revenant
kits.mission: I’ve come back for justice and won’t leave until I get it.

kits.title: Little Hob
kits.mission: As long as I get no thanks around here, you can forget about my help!

kits.title: Troll
kits.mission: Protect friend. Smash enemy!

kits.title: Ascend the Throne
weaknesses: no true claim to the throne
kits.mission: It is my birthright to cast down the tyranny of the throne and unite the people!

kits.title: Foretold Demise
kits.mission: I have seen the end; there is no way out.

kits.title: End the World
kits.mission: Just because I’m ending the world doesn’t mean I can’t be nice about it.

kits.title: Slay the Mighty One
kits.mission: Soon, my friend, I shall be the one to bring down the Beast.

kits.title: Find the Celestial Storyteller
kits.mission: I know not why, yet I feel compelled to follow the signs and turn the page over.

kits.title: Turn the Tides of Darkness
weaknesses: darkness is in all of us
kits.mission: If we wish to turn back the darkness, we must first do so within ourselves.

kits.title: Archmage of the Order
kits.mission: We must train new mages to replace those lost to war and evil.

kits.title: Monarch
kits.mission: All who speak against the crown shall be hung or exiled.

kits.title: Insidious Cult Overlord
kits.mission: The Night Snake must touch every home before we can reveal ourselves.

kits.title: Otherworldly Realm
kits.mission: The Twilight Lands must remain hidden, or risk their fall.

kits.title: Merchant Guildmaster
kits.mission: The Guild is built on profit! Where there is no profit, there is no Guild.

kits.title: Terror of the Land
kits.mission: I am what they fear most.

kits.title: Ambassador of Change
weaknesses: throw the baby out with the bathwater
kits.mission: A new dawn is rising, and there will be no turning back.

kits.title: Lord of the Hunt
kits.mission: Either I hunt a worthy quarry, or it’s no hunt at all.

kits.title: Forger of Celestial Jewels
kits.mission: I shall pour all light into a single gemstone, to be our new sun.

kits.title: Inspired Architect
tags: collapse a building with one strike
kits.mission: The Temple must project power and reverence.

kits.title: Perfected Soul
kits.mission: I AM. Nothing can change that.

kits.title: Mastermind General
kits.mission: Victory has no price; it is its own priceless reward.

kits.title: Archfiend of Bedlam
kits.mission: Who will be the next poor soul to let me into their world?

kits.title: Giant Spider Queen
kits.mission: Once I put out the sun, the entire world will be mine.

kits.title: Dragon
kits.mission: I am lord over these lands. Bow to me, or become my next snack!

kits.title: God-Spirit
kits.mission: Protect my domain.

kits.title: Elemental Titan
kits.mission: All things are mere fleeting shapes of the eternal elements, and must be reshaped again.

kits.title: Powerful Vampire
tags: faster than the eye can see
kits.mission: The people of this town rather suit my palate. I’ll have more.

kits.title: Band of Swords
kits.mission: All for one and one for all!

kits.title: Guardian Spirit
kits.mission: “Promise me that you will destroy the Warlock, and I will forever protect you.”

kits.title: Imposing Wolfhound
tags: push me out of harm’s way
kits.mission: You’re my best friend!

kits.title: Inspiring Master
kits.mission: “Put all of yourself into it, I expect nothing less.”

kits.title: Friend I Just Met
weaknesses: too far out of their way
kits.mission: I love to make friends but I hate when they overstay their welcome…

kits.title: Irksome Pixie
kits.mission: This is going to be the biggest prank YET.

kits.title: Blessing of the Goddess
kits.mission: Be always with the Goddess, and she will always be with you.

kits.title: One with the Dark
kits.mission: Every sunrise, I must return to the womb of darkness, even if briefly.

kits.title: Hex & Curse
kits.mission: Dare to cross me, fool, and I’ll make you regret it.

kits.title: Warding Invocations
kits.mission: That which comes from the other side, must be returned to the other side. No exceptions.

kits.title: Rudimentary Magic
kits.mission: I’m going to keep practicing until I become a true wizard!

kits.title: Grand Necromancy
kits.mission: I shall rule this world with an army of bone and rotted flesh.

kits.title: Handcrafted Pan Flute
kits.mission: A peaceful life is all I want.

kits.title: Impregnable Stronghold
kits.mission: We will be safe here, as long as we stand our ground.

kits.title: Hidden Daggers
kits.mission: One day, one of these will slit the Baron’s throat.

kits.title: Pilfered Possessions
weaknesses: I’ve used all the good stuff
kits.mission: Who do I have to rob around here to get a few coins?

kits.title: Horse & Panoply
kits.mission: I will bring honor to the noble house whose colors I proudly wear.

kits.title: Untold Riches
kits.mission: Everything and everyone has a price, and I can pay it.
